TopicTitle: Can you Glitch Land On Jool?

Articles.Content:
Hey guys, TJ here Just submitting today's challenge, CAN YOU GLITCH LAND ON JOOL? the only way to do it is to EVA just before the kraken attack (For Newer Players: Kraken Are A VERY bad glitch that commonly crash your game) NOTICE: I take no responsibility for Games crashed. WARNING: this will cause EXTREME LAG!! So be careful Rules: Debug menu allowed ONLY during entering the atmosphere of Jool, though No crash Damage is NOT allowed. play with mods if you want (not overpowered please) but I recommend using vanilla KSP (mods cause lag) also This Is VERY important: make sure you take a screenshot with F1, we need photos to see who has done it!

have fun!
Guys also Make sure to quicksave often.
Could you verify this? Many people have attempted to plant flags via EVA and have failed miserably.
Once you drop below the surface, it is over.
The challenger must always complete the challenge himself to prove it is possible.
It is possible to 'land' with KAS and Hooligan labs balloons, however it's not possible to plant a flag on Jools surface from my experience.
I believe Jool was changed in .21, it just kills you now.
Ive landed on jool, kinda, you end up just bouncing around. As far as I know eva is impossible.

Alright, this challenge needs a it of polishing. Considering it's currently impossible to do so (until OP can prove us wrong), that the rules are very unclear and that there's really no point/ranking system, I'll close this challenge now.

OP, if you want to get this challenge going, please read the challenge submission guidelines and make a new thread for your challenge by including the correct information and by giving us your own attempt at the challenge.
